00028 namespace egui { 
00029 
00030 namespace ev { 
00031     struct base ; 
00032     namespace converters {
00033         struct access_win32_data;

00037 namespace detail { 
00038     struct event_manager; 
00039     void set_windows_msg(ev::base& event, unsigned long wm);
00040     unsigned long get_windows_msg(const ev::base & event);
00041 }
00042 
00043 namespace ev {
00044 
00045 typedef enum event_handled_type {
00046     // the event was partially handled - at least one handler was called, but more can be called 
00047     handled_partially,
00048     // the event was fully handled - no more handlers will be called
00049     handled_fully
00050 };
00051 
00054 struct base {
00055     virtual ~base() {}
00056 
00057     virtual void before_handle();
00058     virtual void after_handle();
00059 
00060 protected:
00061     base() ;
00062 public:
00063 
00065     wnd<> destination;
00066 
00068     wnd<> sender;
00069 
00071     event_handled_type handled;
00072 
00075     bool do_default_processing;
00076 
00077 protected:
00078     // just in case the event needs to yield a result (useful mostly for forms)
00079     types::int64 result;
00080 
00081 private:
00082     friend struct egui::detail::event_manager;
00083     friend void detail::set_windows_msg(ev::base& event, unsigned long wm);
00084     friend unsigned long detail::get_windows_msg(const ev::base & event);
00085     friend struct ::egui::ev::converters::access_win32_data;
00086 
00091     unsigned long windows_msg;
00096     types::int64 wparam;
00101     types::int64 lparam;
00102 };
00103 
00108 struct reflectable : base {
00109 };
00110 
00114 struct destroy : base {
00115     destroy( wnd<> w = wnd<>() );
00116 
00117     // what do destroy - if null - any window (when waiting for something to be destroyed)
00118     wnd<> to_destroy;
00119 };
00120 
00121 struct new_event_base : reflectable, boost::enable_shared_from_this<new_event_base> {
00122     new_event_base() : already_sent(false) {}
00123 private:
00124     friend struct egui::window_top;
00125     // we use this to see if an event has already been sent (and at this time it's forwarded)
00126     bool already_sent;
00127 };
00128 
00129 
00130 }

00132 template<class event_type> struct new_event : ev::new_event_base {
00133 };
